articles.title: Netflix Is Finally Giving Hit Show Another Season, See The Trailer - Giant Freakin Robot
articles.description: A hit Netflix series seemed to disappear for the past three years, but now it's coming back with a surprise new season! See the trailer
articles.content:
By Charlene Badasie
| 9 hours ago
After three years, Netflix has finally announced the return of the time-bending sci-fi series Russian Doll. The release date for season two was revealed in a tease… [+3006 chars]
